text.shardthief.dropped_shard_reset: The dropped shard was reset because it remained inactive for too long!
text.shardthief.guide.hold_shard: Hold the shard for enough time to win!
text.shardthief.guide.steal_shard: Punch other players to steal the shard from them.
text.shardthief.guide.drop_shard: Use your bow to make players drop the shard from far away.
text.shardthief.guide.pick_up_shard: Pick up dropped shards by running over them.
